arm_group.description: Candesartan : multiple dose 32mg administered orally Amlodipine : multiple dose 10mg administered orally
Candesartan : multiple dose 32mg administered orally Amlodipine : multiple dose 10mg administered orally

brief_summary.textblock:
Clinical trial to evalate the pharmacokinetic interactions and safety between single dose of
      amlodipine10mg and candesartan32mg and combiation dose amlodipine10mg with candesartan32mg
      in healthy male volunteers.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics Study of amlodipine10mg and candesartan32mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Healthy male, Age 20 to 45

          2. Subject must be willing and able to provide written informed consent to the study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. History of any significant sickness, liver system, gall bladder system, kidney, nerve
             system, respiratory system, blood tumor, endocrine system, urinary system, mental
             disease, muscloskeletal system, immunity system, the ear, nose and throat system and
             cardiovascular system.

          2. History of  any significant gastrointestinal system and surgery of gastrointestinal.

          3. History of any significant hypersensitivity to amlodipine, candesartan, aspirin,
             antibiotic.

          4. Over 10 tobaccos a day.

          5. Other condition which in the opinion of the investigator preclude endrollment into
             the study.

facility.name: Chungnam national university hospital,clinical trial center

clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multiple-dose, Two-arm, One-sequence, Crossover Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics After Oral Concurrent Administration of amlodipine10mg and candesartan32mg in Healthy Male Volunteers

overall_official.affiliation: Chungnam national university hospital, Clinical trial center

primary_outcome.measure: Part A : AUC, Cmax of Candesartan
Par B : AUC, Cmax of Amlodipine

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: PartA: Cmin, tmax, CL/F of Candesartan
PartB: Cmin, tmax, CL/F of Amlodipine

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
